English (string): I'm also a red fish part 2 3.
Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with the Unwearnum class Deep Water Exploration Vessel. [Move: WASD]
You may initially find the quarters confined.
We assure you they meet human habitat standards as defined in Senate Statute 731.
Chart unexplored quadrant A2 of Anfloga, and recover any minerals you may discover.
Long range scans have indicated mineral richness in this quadrant. [Mine: Press Spacebar near a crystal]
Please harvest all mineral deposits in the quadrant. [Mine: Press spacebar near crystal]
The Unwearnum class vessel expends battery power to maintain human life support functions.
Remaining near the surface allows battery recharge via solar energy.
Authorization granted to enable high-output torch. [Torch: Right Click]
Be aware that torch use requires additional battery drain.
These bubbles indicate the presence of a possible power source--please investigate.
Use 5 minerals to create a permanent power station on this geothermal vent. [Build Powerstation: Spacebar]
